title: Manage Prop Inventory for a TV Series
description: A prop master needs to check the availability of a specific prop (a vintage telephone) for an upcoming shoot.

tasks.description: Search the prop inventory system for 'vintage telephone'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds three different vintage telephones in the inventory.

tasks.description: Check the status and location of each telephone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that two are in the warehouse, and one is currently checked out to another production.

tasks.description: Reserve one of the available telephones for the specified shoot dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves the prop for the required dates.
